remarks: Extended real version of ~ lt2add .  Note that ~ ltleadd , which has weaker assumptions, is not true for the extended reals (since ` 0 + +oo < 1 + +oo ` fails).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
statement: xlt2add $p |- ( ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* ) /\ ( C e. RR* /\ D e. RR* ) ) -> ( ( A < C /\ B < D ) -> ( A +e B ) < ( C +e D ) ) ) $.
